Service Details: - Offers an educational group designed for children, ages 7-11, who have a family member living with a mental health issue that enhances their understanding of mental health and/or substance misuse issues, and how these challenges affect them and their families- Provides opportunities to strengthen interpersonal relationships, increase problem solving skills, and to identify networks of support- Also teaches children to anticipate and manage stressors of daily living and to cope with life transitions- Provides a safe environment in which to gain a stronger understanding of self and others
How to Apply: - Families are encouraged to self-refer- Please contact us for further information
